member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.CacheDateUTC
member.summary: UTC Time that this scan info was cached
member.remarks: Used for determining which cached scan info can be discarded if too many scans become cached

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.ScanNumber
member.summary: Scan number

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.MSLevel
member.summary: MS Level
member.returns: MS acquisition level, where 1 means MS, 2 means MS/MS, 3 means MS^3 aka MS/MS/MS

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.EventNumber
member.summary: Event Number
member.returns: 1 for parent-ion scan; 2 for 1st frag scan, 3 for 2nd frag scan, etc.

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.SIMScan
member.summary: SIM Scan Flag
member.returns: True if this is a selected ion monitoring (SIM) scan (i.e. a small mass range is being examined)
member.remarks: If multiple selected ion ranges are examined simultaneously, then this will be false but MRMScanType will be .MRMQMS

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.MRMScanType
member.summary: Multiple reaction monitoring mode
member.returns: 1 or 2 if this is a multiple reaction monitoring scan (MRMQMS or SRM)

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.ZoomScan
member.summary: Zoom scan flag
member.returns: True when the given scan is a zoomed in mass region
member.remarks: These spectra are typically skipped when creating SICs

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.NumPeaks
member.summary: Number of mass intensity value pairs
member.returns: Number of points, -1 if unknown

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.RetentionTime
member.summary: Retention time (in minutes)

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.LowMass
member.summary: Lowest m/z value

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.HighMass
member.summary: Highest m/z value

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.TotalIonCurrent
member.summary: Total ion current
member.returns: Sum of all ion abundances

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.BasePeakMZ
member.summary: Base peak m/z
member.returns: m/z value of the most abundant ion in the scan

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.BasePeakIntensity
member.summary: Base peak intensity
member.returns: Intensity of the most abundant ion in the scan

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.FilterText
member.summary: Scan Filter string

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.ParentIonMZ
member.summary: Parent ion m/z

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.ActivationType
member.summary: Activation type (aka activation method) as reported by the reader

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.CollisionMode
member.summary: Collision mode, determined from the filter string

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.IonMode
member.summary: Ionization polarity

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.MRMInfo
member.summary: MRM mode

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.UniformTime
member.summary: Indicates whether the sampling time increment for the controller is constant

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.Frequency
member.summary: Sampling frequency for the current controller

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.IsCentroided
member.summary: Centroid scan flag
member.returns: True if centroid (sticks) scan; False if profile (continuum) scan

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.IsFTMS
member.summary: FTMS flag
member.returns: True if acquired on a high resolution mass analyzer (for example, on an Orbitrap or Q-Exactive)

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.ScanEvents
member.summary: Scan event data
member.returns: List of key/value pairs

member.name: P:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.StatusLog
member.summary: Status log data
member.returns: List of key/value pairs

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor with only scan number

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.#ctor(System.Int32,ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.FinniganFileReaderBaseClass.udtScanHeaderInfoType)
member.summary: Constructor with scan number and data in a udtScanHeaderInfoType struct

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.StoreScanEvents(System.String[],System.String[])
member.summary: Store this scan's scan events using a parallel string arrays

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.StoreStatusLog(System.String[],System.String[])
member.summary: Store this scan's scan events using a parallel string arrays

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo.TryGetScanEvent(System.String,System.String@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the event value associated with the given scan event name
member.param: Event name to find
Event value
Set to true to match the start of an event name, and not require a full match
member.returns: True if found a match for the event name, otherwise false
member.remarks: Event names nearly always end in a colon, e.g. "Monoisotopic M/Z:" or "Charge State:"

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.XRawFileIO.ExtractParentIonMZFromFilterText(System.String,System.Double@,System.Int32@,System.String@)
member.summary: Parse out the parent ion and collision energy from strFilterText
member.param: Parent ion m/z (output)
MSLevel (output)
Collision mode (output)
member.returns: True if success
member.remarks: If multiple parent ion m/z values are listed then dblParentIonMZ will have the last one. However, if the filter text contains "Full msx" then dblParentIonMZ will have the first parent ion listed

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.XRawFileIO.ExtractParentIonMZFromFilterText(System.String,System.Double@,System.Int32@,System.String@,System.Collections.Generic.List{ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.XRawFileIO.udtParentIonInfoType}@)
member.summary: Parse out the parent ion and collision energy from strFilterText
member.param: Parent ion m/z (output)
MSLevel (output)
Collision mode (output)
member.returns: True if success
member.remarks: If multiple parent ion m/z values are listed then dblParentIonMZ will have the last one. However, if the filter text contains "Full msx" then dblParentIonMZ will have the first parent ion listed

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.XRawFileIO.GetScanInfo(System.Int32,ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.FinniganFileReaderBaseClass.udtScanHeaderInfoType@)
member.summary: Get the header info for the specified scan
member.param: Scan number
Scan header info struct
member.returns: True if no error, False if an error

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.XRawFileIO.GetScanInfo(System.Int32,ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.clsScanInfo@)
member.summary: Get the header info for the specified scan
member.param: Scan number
Scan header info class
member.returns: True if no error, False if an error

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.XRawFileIO.ValidateMSScan(System.String,System.Int32@,System.Boolean@,ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.FinniganFileReaderBaseClass.MRMScanTypeConstants@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Examines strFilterText to validate that it is a supported scan type
member.returns: True if strFilterText contains a known MS scan type

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.XRawFileIO.GetScanData(System.Int32,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@,ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.FinniganFileReaderBaseClass.udtScanHeaderInfoType@)
member.summary: Obtain the mass and intensity for the specified scan
member.param: Unused; parameter retained for compatibility reasons
member.returns: The number of data points, or -1 if an error
member.remarks: If intMaxNumberOfPeaks is 0 (or negative), then returns all data; set intMaxNumberOfPeaks to > 0 to limit the number of data points returned

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.XRawFileIO.GetScanData(System.Int32,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@,ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.FinniganFileReaderBaseClass.udtScanHeaderInfoType@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Obtain the mass and intensity for the specified scan
member.param: Unused; parameter retained for compatibility reasons
True to centroid the data, false to return as-is (either profile or centroid, depending on how the data was acquired)
member.returns: The number of data points, or -1 if an error
member.remarks: If intMaxNumberOfPeaks is 0 (or negative), then returns all data; set intMaxNumberOfPeaks to > 0 to limit the number of data points returned

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.XRawFileIO.GetScanData(System.Int32,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@,ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.FinniganFileReaderBaseClass.udtScanHeaderInfoType@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Obtain the mass and intensity for the specified scan
member.param: Unused; parameter retained for compatibility reasons
Set to 0 (or negative) to return all of the data
member.returns: The number of data points, or -1 if an error
member.remarks: If intMaxNumberOfPeaks is 0 (or negative), then returns all data; set intMaxNumberOfPeaks to > 0 to limit the number of data points returned

member.name: M:ThermoRawFileReaderDLL.FinniganFileIO.XRawFileIO.GetScanData2D(System.Int32,System.Double[0:,0:]@)
member.summary: Obtain the mass and intensity for the specified scan

Maximum number of data points; 0 to return all data
